en.name: Cyber End Dragon the Decisive Strike Dragon
en.effect:
3 Machine monsters with 2100 or more ATK
Must be Fusion Summoned. If this card is Fusion Summoned using only LIGHT monsters: You can pay 4000 LP; add 1 "Limiter Removal" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Cyber End Dragon the Decisive Strike Dragon" once per turn. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. This card whose current ATK is higher than its original ATK can make up to 3 attacks during each Battle Phase.

ja.name: 終撃竜－サイバー・エンド・ドラゴン

yugipedia.name: Cyber End Dragon the Decisive Strike Dragon
